short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the best of Social Blade Stats right on YouTube, TwitchTV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** AUGUST 2024 UPDATE ***
As of Chrome version 127, the YouTube functionality of this extension is no longer operational due to Google removing a core feature it relied upon. In the coming months, the Social Blade team will be completely redesigning this extension to be compatible with the new features in Chrome 127 and future versions. By keeping this extension installed, you will receive an automatic update once the new version is available. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we work to restore functionality soon!
***


Adds a box to the right of the video you're watching on YouTube showing the most important statistics from Social Blade about the channel.

YouTube Statistics Include:
► Channel Grade (quickly judge if the channel is average or top of the class)
► Subscriber & View Rank
► Estimated Monthly Earnings for the channel
► Subscribers & Views in the past 30 days (includes % growth)
► Average daily subs & views
► Subs & views gained today
► Tags video uses

Also provides an easy link to view the channel on Social Blade as well as a way to view the Live Sub Count on Social Blade

Requires a free SocialBlade.com dashboard account to use

Need help? Open a support ticket here: https://support.socialblade.com

Whats New:
2.4.14 Minor bug fixes
